'''The Gourmet Supremos''' is a series of [[World Quests]] and [[Commissions]] in [[Inazuma]] and [[Sumeru]]. It revolves around the titular [[Gourmet Supremos]], a group of three people from around [[Teyvat]] with an interest in local cuisines.
